title: I am not Authorised? Riot?
body: So im a little confused Riot im not able to up-vote any message on the boards for whatever reason. I've basically been away for a good year coming back once or twice for the memories. so if something changed with this whole system or 1 year ago me did something stupid can i know cause its kinda weird not up-voting deserved posts?

replies.body:
Welcome to the party my friend 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Weird....I'm still able to upvote/downvote freely so the feature is still working. Is there some kind of error or anything or does it just not respond at all? Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps and let me know!

Weird im able to vote for yours but whenever i go to this page it says Not Authorised or Not level 30

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/1O0Ebrr6-crackpot-theory-sorakas-real-power?comment=00020000

i can still edit n all that but no voting? ima try a different board

Hmmmmm I can still upvote all of those over there as well. This is pretty weird tbh. Did you try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) just in case? I also went ahead and synced your profile on my end to see if that helps!
yes i cleared it. its not necessarily a big issue considering as far as i can see its just that one page that i cant upvote.
Actually just noticed, you aren't quite level 30 yet on the client. Once you hit level 30 you should be able to freely vote! Sorry about all that confusion from me not checking the level xD
XD great so its my noob level thats the issue lol. kinda gonna be hard since i cant exactly play now a day :) shite internet plus laptop equals not a good time sadly. well ima have fun lol
Im thinking its like the Month-Year old boards that i cant do it on, just tried one from like 2 years ago "not authorised" tries this message n perfectly fine
yep still giving me the little messages, is it because its an old board page?

from what i can see i simply cant do this for the Month Old boards. which is not a problem just a lil tid bit otherwise everything works fines. got a nice lil community here n its nice to be back. minus the Teem- i mean toxic lol. have fun in league n hopefully one day i'll return to the battlefield, cant do much on this old laptop now can i ;) PRAISE SHURIMA! {{champion:268}} {{champion:136}}  and fear the dragon >:)
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
